**Enhanced Creativity**: I would increase my creativity to be able to think of innovative solutions and ideas more easily. This would allow me to excel in my creative pursuits and make a greater impact in my work and personal projects.

**Increased Physical Strength and Endurance**: I would increase my physical strength and endurance to be able to perform better in sports and physical activities. This would also improve my overall health and well-being.

**Superhuman Speed**: I would enhance my speed to be able to move around more quickly and efficiently. This would allow me to travel faster, complete tasks more quickly, and even escape from danger if necessary.

**Teleportation**: I would give myself the ability to teleport to any location instantly. This would allow me to travel the world without the need for transportation, saving time and reducing my carbon footprint.

**Shapeshifting**: I would give myself the ability to shapeshift into any form I desire. This would allow me to adapt to any situation, overcome any obstacle, and even interact with the world in unique and creative ways.
